title: Tree Diameter

similar_questions.title: Count Subtrees With Max Distance Between Cities
Find Minimum Diameter After Merging Two Trees

hints: Start at any node A and traverse the tree to find the furthest node from it, let's call it B.
Having found the furthest node B, traverse the tree from B to find the furthest node from it, lets call it C.
The distance between B and C is the tree diameter.
